method.name: i_cal_vcard_parser_parse_string

returns.comment: A newly created #ICalVcardComponent, or %NULL on error.

method.comment: Parses the vCard string @str and returns an #ICalVcardComponent, or %NULL when the parse failed.

method.name: i_cal_vcard_parser_errstr
method.comment: Converts an error code into its text representation.
